Extra Performance: Bardic Performance +6 rd/dy
Bardic Performance: May use Bardic Performance effect 50 rd/dy
Familiar: Special bond and abilities
Lingering Performance: Bardic Performance effects continue for 2 rd after performance ends

Skill Notes:

Sea Shanty: R30' May use Bardic Performance to allow Allies to use self Perform to save vs. exhausted, fatigued, nauseated, and sickened
World Traveler: May reroll Knowledge (Geography), Knowledge (Local), Knowledge (Nature), or Linguistics 5/dy

Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 6; B1: 6; B2: 6; B3: 5; B4: 5; B5: 5; B6: 5 Spell DC: B: 12
Spells:
Blindness/Deafness (B2 Necr): R300' Target suffers self choice of blindness or deafness (DC 14 Fort neg) permanently
Blood Biography (B2 Divi): Target blood identifies name and type of creature it came from and when and how it was shed (DC 14 Will neg)
Control Water (Call The Storm4 Tran): R1200' Raises or lowers 20 10'x10'x2' of water 40' for 200 min
Control Weather (Call The Storm7 Tran): Modifies seasonal weather in 2 mile radius for 4d12 hr
Control Winds (Call The Storm5 Tran): R800' Changes wind direction and speed 6 levels in 800'x40' cylinder for 200 min
Cure Critical Wounds (B4 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 4d8+20 HP (DC 16 Will half)
Denounce (B4 Ench): R75' Creatures in 30' radius shift attitude toward target 2 levels worse (DC 16 Will neg) for 20 hr; target suffers -10 Diplomacy checks to improve attitude of those affected
Detect Magic (B0 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on magical auras for conc or 20 min
Disguise Self (B1 Illu): Self changes appearance and gains +10 Disguise for 200 min
Enthrall (B2 Ench): R300' Listeners become captivated (DC 14 Will neg) for conc or 1 hr
Eyebite (B6 Necr): R75' Renders 1 target/rd with 1/5/10 HD comatose 200 min/panicked for 1d4 rd and shaken for 200 min/sickened for 200 min for 6 rd (DC 18 Fort neg)
Frozen Note (B5 Ench): Creatures up to 23 HD in 30' radius held spellbound (17-23 HD DC 17 Will neg) for conc or 20 rd
Getaway (B6 Conj): R30' Self and 10 willing pre-selected targets teleport to a prepared location
Ghost Sound (B0 Illu): R75' Produces sound volume of 20 humans (DC 12 Will disbelieve) for 20 rd
Glibness (B3 Tran): Self gains +20 Bluff, SR 35 (magical lie detection) for 200 min
Good Hope (B3 Ench): R300' 20 targets in 15' radius gain +2 attack, damage, saves, and checks for 20 min
Greater Shout (B6 Evoc): R60' Cone inflicts 10d6 HP, deafness for 4d6 rd, and stunning for 1 rd (DC 18 Fort half HP and deafness only)
Gust Of Wind (Whistle The Wind2 Evoc): 60' 50 MPH gust affects medium or smaller creatures (DC 13 Fort neg) for 1 rd
Irresistible Dance (B6 Ench): Touched dances (-4 AC, -10 Reflex) for d4+1 rd (DC 18 Will for 1 rd)
Locate Object (B2 Divi): Self senses direction of object or type in 1200' radius for 20 min
Major Image (B3 Illu): R1200' Creates 24 10' cu image w/sound, smell, and thermal effects (DC 15 Will disbelieve) for conc + 3 rd
Mass Cure Light Wounds (B5 Conj): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius heal (undead suffer) 1d8+20 HP (DC 17 Will half)
Mass Fox's Cunning (B6 Tran): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius gain +4 Intelligence for 20 min
Memory Lapse (B1 Ench): R75' Target forgets prior rd (DC 13 Will neg)
Mending (B0 Tran): R10' Repairs minor damage to 20 lb object
Modify Memory (B4 Ench): R75' Changes 5 min of target's memory (DC 16 Will neg)
Phantasmal Web (B5 Illu): R300' 20 targets in 15' radius suffer entanglement (DC 17 Will neg) and nauseated (DC 17 Fort each rd neg) for 20 rd
Read Magic (B0 Divi): Self can read magical writing for 200 min
Scrying (B3 Divi): Self views target (DC 15 Will neg) for 20 min
Secret Page (B3 Tran): Hides content of touched page permanently
Seeming (B5 Illu): R75' Appearance of 10 targets in 15' radius changes (DC 17 Will disbelieve), gives +10 Disguise for 12 hr
Shadow Conjuration (B4 Illu): Mimics conjuration (creation or summoning) spell up to 3rd level (DC 16 Will 20% effect)
Sift (B0 Divi): R30' Successful -5 Perception notes fine details at range
Sleep (B1 Ench): R300' 4 HD of creatures in 10' radius sleep (DC 13 Will neg) for 20 min
Song Of Discord (B5 Ench): R300' Creatures in 20' radius have 50% chance each rd of attacking neighbor (DC 17 Will neg) for 20 rd
Storm Of Vengeance (Call The Storm9 Conj): R1200' 360' radius storm deafens for 1d4x10 min (DC 21 Fort neg), then rains acid inflicting 1d6 HP, then generates 6 bolts lightning that inflict 10d6 HP each (DC 21 Ref half), then hail that inflicts 5d6 HP, then obscures vision for 6 rd
Summon Instrument (B0 Conj): Musical instrument appears for 20 min
Touch Of Gracelessness (B1 Tran): Touched suffers 1d6+5 Dexterity damage, knocked prone by moving more than half speed, and flying maneuverability reduced one step (DC 13 Fort half Dexterity damage only) for 20 rd
Unseen Servant (B1 Conj): R75' Invisible servant obeys self for 20 hr
Versatile Weapon (B2 Tran): R75' Target weapon bypasses DR choice of bludgeoning, cold iron, piercing, silver, or slashing for 20 min
Zone Of Silence (B4 Illu): No sound escapes 5' radius for 20 hr
Magic Notes:
Charisma Bard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level B1, B2
Simple Somatics: Suffers no arcane spell failure in light armor
Brew Potion: May create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Call The Storm: May use Bardic Performance to use Control Water, Control Weather, Control Winds, or Storm Of Vengeance effects
Craft Staff: May create magic staves
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Deadly Performance: R30' Bardic Performance kills target (DC 22 Will staggered for 1d4 rd)
Dirge Of Doom: R30' Bardic Performance inflicts shaken
Distraction: R30' Bardic Performance gives Perform check vs. visual magic
Fascinate: R90' Bardic Performance holds 7 creatures spellbound (DC 22 Will neg)
Frightening Tune: R30' Bardic Performance causes foes to flee (DC 22 Will neg)
Inspire Courage: Bardic Performance gives allies +4 attack, damage, and charm and fear saves
Inspire Greatness: R30' Bardic Performance gives 4 allies 2d10 temporary HP, +2 attack, and +1 Fortitude
Inspire Heroics: R30' Bardic Performance gives 2 allies +4 AC and saves
Soothing Performance: R30' May use Mass Cure Serious Wounds effects via 4 rd Bardic Performance; also removes fatigued, sickened, and shaken
Still Water: R30' May use Bardic Performance to give listeners -20 DC (min DC 10) for Profession (Sailor), Swim, Acrobatics (shipboard), and Climb (shipboard); 10 rd performance extends effect to 1 hr
Whistle The Wind: May use Bardic Performance to use Gust Of Wind effects; 5 rd performance extends effect to 1 min
Companions
Familiar: Weasel "Ziczastwe"
Str: 3 (-4) Dex: 15 (+2) Con: 10 (+0) Int: 15 (+2) Wis: 12 (+1) Cha: 5 (-3) Size: T Speed: 20
HD/HP: 20/62 Init: +2 AC: 25 Attack: +19 1d3-4 CMB/CMD: +15/21 Fort/Ref/Will: +6/+14/+13
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Companion Spell Resistance; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Scry On Familiar; Share Spells; Speak With Like Animals; Speak With Master
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: May deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: May share emotions up to 1 mile
Scry On Familiar: Master may view companion 1/dy
Share Spells: Master may share self spell w/adjacent companion
Speak With Like Animals: May talk w/similar creatures
Speak With Master: May talk w/master in secret language
